Name: Boom
About the game: Get ready for explosive excitement in Boom! In this fast-paced action game, you'll face off against a variety of monsters in each stage. As you progress through the levels, you'll have the opportunity to pick up different bombs and power-ups that will help you defeat your enemies and advance to the next stage. With challenging gameplay, colorful graphics, and a variety of levels to play through, Boom will keep you on the edge of your seat from start to finish. Don't wait any longer to join the action - download Boom today and see if you have what it takes to be the ultimate bomber, but be careful not to get blown up first! Features Fast-paced action gameplay Find key hidden inside the crates to open the door to complete the level Collect different types of power-ups hidden inside the crates Customize your character from top to bottom Progressive difficulty that increases as the player advance through the levels Unique boss fight in final level of the stage Upcoming Features More single player levels (5 different stages with 20 levels each) Multiplayer mode - play with 2-4 players/friends Multiplayer mode - different modes (free-for-all, team) Steam achievements Steam leaderboard
